about_the_game:
Step back into 1999, where mystery and terror collide. You are Detective Miller, tasked with investigating a gruesome crime scene in a remote forest. Among the chilling evidence, you discover a set of VHS tapes belonging to an urban explorer. As you delve into the footage, you relive their terrifying journey—exploring creepy, abandoned locations that were never meant to be uncovered.

Every tape unravels a new layer of darkness, immersing you in a world where every corner could hide danger, and every discovery could be your last. Play as both the detective investigating the crime and the explorer captured on the tapes, navigating between two chilling perspectives as you uncover the horrifying truth.

Explore abandoned buildings, forgotten places, and eerie locations filled with secrets—Piece together clues, use resources, and face unspeakable horrors lurking in the shadows.

Immerse yourself in a late-90s horror atmosphere with VHS tapes, vintage technology, synthesizer music, and creepy places to Urban Explore.

Collect and watch VHS tapes that slowly reveal the terrifying events leading up to the crime.

Investigate as Detective Miller while reliving the events from the tapes as an urban explorer. Two perspectives, one terrifying mystery.

content_descriptors.notes: As you experience the game you will be put in many frightening places with some blood on the walls and skulls. Investigate scary crime scenes, uncover dark secrets, and face unspeakable horrors.

Step back into 1999, where mystery and terror collide. You are Detective Miller, tasked with investigating a gruesome crime scene in a remote forest. Among the chilling evidence, you discover a set of VHS tapes belonging to an urban explorer. As you delve into the footage, you relive their terrifying journey—exploring creepy, abandoned locations that were never meant to be uncovered.

Every tape unravels a new layer of darkness, immersing you in a world where every corner could hide danger, and every discovery could be your last. Explore abandoned buildings, forgotten places, and eerie locations filled with secrets—Piece together clues, use resources, and face unspeakable horrors lurking in the shadows.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey/Catalina
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X 4 GB Intel UHD Graphics 630 1536 MB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey or Later
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X 4 GB Intel UHD Graphics 630 1536 MB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default

name: Urbex Awakening

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7500U CPU @ 2.70GHz 2.90 GHz
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 620
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel(R) Display Audio
  • Additional Notes: Developed and Played on a lower end PC. So If you have a good PC you are ok

short_description: It’s 1999. As a detective, you've discovered a set of eerie VHS tapes at a gruesome crime scene. Play as the urban explorer recorded on the tapes, reliving their terrifying journey through abandoned places. Investigate, uncover the truth, and survive the horrors captured on film.
